name: Spaceborne Survivors
description:
Spaceborne Survivors is a minimalistic time-based survival game.
Defend Human space colonies from invading fleets of corporate overlords and alien conquerors. Endure until the reinforcements arrive! Gather experience cores and improve your chances as well as boost your comrades!

Starting Tips:
Take your time to grab experience cores, they don't disappear.
Get offensive weapons at first, to give you a better edge and don't be afraid of dying.
